coredata.dc:title: The theoretical equation for the self-diffusion of interacting particles. Relation to the particle pair distribution function
coredata.dc:creator: Sasaki, Shigeo
coredata.dc:description:
Abstract
The force constant, K, and the average number of particles interacting with one particle, N, appearing in a previously reported theoretical equation for mean-square displacements of interacting particles should be consistent with those estimated from a pair distribution function. The values K and N obtained from an analysis of the experimental mean-square displacement in polystyrene latex particles agree with those estimated from the particle pair distribution function.
